{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$336.0K in 2021-2022** on contracts with CANADIAN LEASEBACK.

Across 174 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 23 have at least one amendment (13%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 50% and the average number of amendments was 1.74. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$4.1M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.73 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$180.4K. The longest contract was 4.57 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$7.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [CANADIAN LEASEBACK(GP)INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22CANADIAN%20LEASEBACK%28GP%29INC.%22)
{{< /details >}}
